title: Allow importing multi-file GGUF models
summary:
### What is the issue?

Currently Ollama can [import GGUF files](https://github.com/ollama/ollama/blob/main/docs/import.md). However, larger models are sometimes split into separate files. Ollama should support loading multiple GGUF files similar to loading safetensor files.


### OS

_No response_

title: [PR] pnpm: refactor fetchDeps and configHook to top-level attributes
summary:
This PR brings pnpm in line with other fetchers and config hooks from the Node ecosystem.

See commit descriptions for details of each change.

In the future, we will want to make `pnpm.fetchDeps` and `pnpm.configHook` throw, instead of warn. Perhaps we can do that in a few months to give the ec

title: [PR] Feature: Interactive Package Conflict Resolution + Saved Preferences(Issue #42)
summary:
## Summary
<!-- Brief description of changes -->Implements interactive package conflict resolution UI and persistent conflict-resolution preferences.

- Add interactive conflict-resolution UI to `cortex/cli.py`.
  - Prompts user to choose which package to keep/remove when conflicts are detected.
